info.task: navigate forwards to a button inside a form landmark
info.title: Navigate forwards to a button inside a form landmark in reading mode

setupScript.name: setFocusBeforeForm
setupScript.description: sets focus on a link before the form landmark
setupScript.source:
// sets focus on a link before the form landmark
testPageDocument.getElementById('beforelink').focus();

user: With the reading cursor on the 'Navigate forwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Add contact' button.
instructions.raw: With the reading cursor on the 'Navigate forwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Add contact' button.
instructions.mode: Verify the Virtual Cursor is active by pressing Alt+Delete. If it is not, turn on the Virtual Cursor by pressing Insert+Z.

assertions.expectation: Name of the group, 'Add Contact', is conveyed
Name of the button, 'Add Contact', is conveyed
